quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Mission Amrit Sarovar?

1.      IISc Bengaluru is the technical partner.

2.      It has a target to construct or rejuvenate 75,000 Amrit Sarovar ponds across India till 15th August 2023.

3.      Every Amrit Sarovar will have a pondage area of at least 5 acres with a water holding capacity of about 10,000 cubic metre.
options: 1 and 3
2 and 3
3 only
1, 2 and 3
None of the above

quiz.text: As per the paragraph, to meet the larger vision of achieving Zero Carbon Emission Goal, Ministry of Ports, Shipping & Waterways has launched __________ the Green Port Guidelines.
options: ‘Harit Sagar’
‘Prakrit Sagar’
‘Hydrogen Sagar’
‘Clean Sagar’
‘Green Sagar’

quiz.text: The Ministry of Ports, Shipping and Waterways has also awarded the Sagar Shreshtha Samman awards to major ports for their all-time best performance on select operational and financial parameters during FY - 2022-23. Which of the following port has won in the category of “Award for achieving major milestone in Turn Around Time”?
options: Cochin Port, Kerala
Paradip Port, Jagatsinghpur, Odisha
Jawaharlal Nehru Port, Mumbai, Maharashtra
Deendayal Port, Kandla, Gujarat
V. O. Chidambaranar Port, Tamil Nadu

quiz.text: As per recent (May 2023) news, the Finance Ministry has notified a reduction in the threshold for e-invoicing. Effective August 1, 2023, any taxpayer with a turnover exceeding __________ should raise e-invoices for B2B supplies.
options: ₹10 crore
₹50 crore
₹1 crore
₹25 crore
₹5 crore

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), as per commerce ministry data, which of the following has become India’s 3rd largest export destination in FY23 after US, UAE?
options: Australia
United Kingdom
Russia
Netherlands
Japan

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Union Health Secretary has launched the SAKSHAM. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to SAKSHAM?
options: SAKSHAM stands for ‘Stimulating Advanced Knowledge for Sustainable Health Management’.
It is a Learning Management Information System (LMIS) of Ministry of Health and Family Welfare.
It has been developed by National Informatics Centre.
It provides online training and medical education to all health professionals in the country.
None of the above

quiz.text: The introduction of cheetahs in India is being done under Project Cheetah, which is the world's first intercontinental large wild carnivore translocation project. Cheetahs are being introduced in which of the following National Parks?
options: Gir National Park
Similipal National Park
Kuno National Park
Bhitarkanika National Park
Bandhavgarh National Park

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), data has been shared by Bureau of Energy Efficiency (BEE), Ministry of Power regarding star labelling Programme. Star Labelling Programme was launched in which of the following years?
options: 2014
2010
2012
2006
2008

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Union Minister for Environment, Forest, and Climate Change launched a mobile application, called “Meri LiFE” (My life). Upon successful sign-up, users will be guided to participate in a series of LiFE related tasks under different themes. Which of the following is not one of the themes?
options: Save Energy
Save Water
Reduce Single Use Plastic
Adopt Vegan Food Systems
Adopt Healthy Lifestyle

quiz.text: Limit of Open Access Transaction under Green Energy Open Access Rules has been changed from ____________ for green energy, to enable small consumers to purchase RE (renewable energy).
options: 10 MW to 1 MW
5 MW to 1 MW
1 MW to 500 kW
2 MW to 500 kW
1 MW to 100 kW

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Secretary, Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities (DEPwD) chaired a meeting on series of reforms for implementation of the provisions of “Rights of Persons with Disabilities Act 2016”. The Act recognizes __________ types of disabilities, as compared to 7 types under the previous law.
options: 18
20
14
21
12

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to Shanghai Corporation Organization (SCO)?
options: Initially it was known as Shanghai Six.
Its secretariat is in Moscow.
It represents 58% of world’s population.
India became a member of SCO a year before Pakistan.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Union Minister of Health and Family Welfare, Govt. of India has addressed the G7 Health Ministerial meeting on Global Health Architecture. Health Ministers of the G7 countries and invited “Outreach 4” countries were present in the meeting. Which of the following country was not part of “Outreach 4” countries?
options: India
Philippines
Indonesia
Vietnam
Thailand

quiz.text:
Recently (May 2023), a communique has been issued on conclusion of talks between Union Minister of Commerce & Industry, Government of India and leaders of European Free Trade Association (EFTA). Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to EFTA?

1.      EFTA is an intergovernmental organization, created as an alternative trade bloc for those European states that were unable or unwilling to join the European Union (EU).

2.      It was set up in 1960.

3.      EFTA has seven member states.
options: 1 and 2
2 and 3
1 and 3
2 only
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), 1st Ministerial meeting of India- EU Trade and Technology Council has taken place in which of the following places?
options: New Delhi, India
Frankfurt, Germany
Paris, France
Vienna, Austria
Brussels, Belgium

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), India-EU FTA negotiations has been discussed. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to India-EU trade?
options: India’s bilateral trade with the EU amounted to USD 116.36 billion in 2021-22.
Bilateral trade achieved impressive annual growth of 43.5% in 2021-22.
India's export to the EU jumped 57% in FY 2021-22 to $65 billion.
India has a surplus trade with the EU.
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (May 2023), Ministry of New & Renewable Energy (MNRE) has come up with a number of reforms in its ALMM (Approved List of Models and Manufactures) mechanism for Solar Photovoltaic Modules. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to reforms?

1.      Application fee reduced by 90%.

2.      Refund of 100% of application fee, on application withdrawal before factory inspection.

3.      ALMM listing validity increased from 2 to 4 years.
options: 1 and 2
3 only
2 only
2 and 3
None of the Above

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), 3rd Energy Transition Working Group Meeting under G20 has been organized at which of the following places?
options: Mumbai, Maharashtra
Ahmedabad, Gujarat
Jaipur, Rajasthan
Panaji, Goa
Srinagar, J&K

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), WHO has launched its first-ever comprehensive framework on reducing ‘X’, calling on countries to accelerate action to halve ‘X’ prevalence in women of reproductive age by 2025. Which of the following refers to ‘X’?
options: Tuberculosis
Anaemia
Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS)
HIV AIDS
Gynecologic Cancer

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), __________ has become the first Indian city to track progress towards meeting SDGs.
options: Bhopal
Indore
Chandigarh
Hyderabad
Guwahati

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), the ________ on Climate Change has been held in Berlin to discuss the way forward towards COP28.
options: Frankfurt Dialogue
Hindenburg Dialogue
Petersberg Dialogue
Alps Dialogue
Chancellor Dialogue

quiz.text:
Recently (May 2023), the 42nd Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) Summit has formally kicked off. Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to ASEAN Summit?

1.      Vietnam is the host country of 42nd ASEAN Summit.

2.      Theme of 42nd Meeting is "ASEAN Matters: Epicentrum of Growth".

3.      ASEAN Summit is held twice a year.
options: 1 and 2
2 and 3
2 only
3 only
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), India has extended USD 1 billion credit line for Sri Lanka by a year until March 2024. The credit line, part of about _________ in emergency assistance extended by India during the peak of Sri Lanka's financial crisis.
options: USD 2 billion
USD 4 billion
USD 3 billion
USD 1.5 billion
USD 2.5 billion

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to 6th Indian Ocean Conference (IOC)?

1.      Bangladesh is the host of 6th Indian Ocean Conference (IOC).

2.      Participants included government delegations and think tanks from about 25 countries, including representatives from D8, SAARC and BIMSTEC.

3.      It has been organized by India Foundation in association with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Bangladesh and S. Rajaratnam School of International Studies.
options: 1 only
2 and 3
3 only
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (May 2023), Fitch has projected India’s GDP growth forecast for 2023-24 to be ________.
options: 6.4%
6.2%
5.8%
6.0%
6.5%
